ingredients.content: 1 Tbsp fresh parsley, leaves only, chopped, for garnish

preparations.content: Place Parmesan in mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place butter and garlic in mixing bowl then chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Melt <b>3 min/100°C/speed 0.5<b>.
Add mushrooms, thyme and oregano then, with simmering basket in place of measuring cup, cook <b>12 min/100°C//speed <b>.
Add cream, cream cheese, salt, pepper and reserved grated Parmesan then, with simmering basket in place of measuring cup, cook <b>7 min/100°C//speed <b>. Serve garnished with chopped parsley.
